com.badlogic.gdx

Class ScreenAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Screen

    public class ScreenAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Screen
    Convenience implementation of Screen. Derive from this and only override what you need.
    Author:
    semtiko
